name: Write punishment(shoggoth)
description: It is briefly a letter on the front cover titled shoggoth. Its contents are drawn with chaotic handwriting in disorderly, figures and mathematical expressions whose meanings are unknown, languages that have never been seen, and picturesque of monstrous monstrous names. The crazy sight that seems to stick to the retina unexpectedly to an ordinary person seemed to wanted to turn his eyes considerably, but the body frees the page without permission as if fascinated. Then strange things nature and content came into my mind. Apparently this is like a recipe to build a follower called shoggoth.
